content.question: Which of the following best describes the frog speciesâ€™ range of tolerance to acidic conditions?

choices.label: The frogs can tolerate any <math alttext="p H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> greater than <math alttext="6" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The frogs can tolerate a <math alttext="p H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> between <math alttext="4.5" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4.5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="6" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The frogs can tolerate a <math alttext="p H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> between <math alttext="3.5" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3.5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="5" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The frogs can tolerate any <math alttext="p H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> less than <math alttext="4" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.

content.answer: The frogs can tolerate a <math alttext="p H" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>pH</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> between <math alttext="4.5" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4.5</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="6" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>6</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Describe relationships among variables in data represented.
